name: Exploding Adventurer
description:
This game was made in 4.5 hours. That's why there is no sound or menu and only 7 lvls.

Thanks to Miziziz for template project and to Sebastian Lague for game idea generator; the prompt was:

"A puzzle game that takes place in a cave, where you play as a scientist with a tendency to spontaneously combust who desperately wants to learn to play an instrument."
